"Curiosity, I'm telling you, we need to grab the next opportunity to avenge our fallen comrade!"

"And I killed cats, hence why I've been exiled here. If any aliens show up, I'll be sure to zap them with my laser. Now, if you don't mind..."

"zzz...zzz...zzz..."

"Oh, right, I forgot about that... Curiosity, come on, man!"

Meanwhile, on Earth...

"Say, uh, anyone know why the rovers are talking?"

"They always talk to us, Carl."

"No, I mean to each other, Dave. They're talking to each other, something about Martians with spears and killing Spirit."

"Spirit? Oh, the other rover."

"Hey, Spirit was my favourite. Opportunity always seemed to be the more boisterous of the two. Hmm, probably why it decided to proclaim seniority over Curiosity."

"Are you, uh, alright Carl? Maybe you should see a doctor or something."

"But I'm telling you, the rovers are talking to each other!"

"Sure they are, Carl. Come on."

"But... but..."

"Now now, Carl, let's just be quiet, shall we?"
